flounder.lights

Class Fog

  • java.lang.Object
    • flounder.lights.Fog

  • public class Fog
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a fog in the world.

    • Constructor Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • Fog

        public Fog(Colour fogColour,
           float fogDensity,
           float fogGradient,
           float skyLowerLimit,
           float skyUpperLimit)
        Creates a new fog.
        Parameters:
        fogColour - The colour of the fog.
        fogDensity - How dense the fog will be.
        fogGradient - The gradient of the fog.
        skyLowerLimit - At what height will the skybox fog begin to appear.
        skyUpperLimit - At what height will there be skybox no fog.
